<script>

//Alterar labels de botões
$(document).ready(function(){
    $("input#saveAsDraft").val("GUARDAR");
    $("input#submit").val("GUARDAR");
    $("button#cancel").html("CANCELAR");
    $("button[name=cancel]").click(function() {
            window.sessionStorage.setItem("button", "null");
            window.sessionStorage.setItem("previousPage", "processo");
        });
        
        $("form").submit(function() {
            var btnVal = $(document.activeElement).val();
            
            if(btnVal === 'GUARDAR'){
                window.sessionStorage.setItem("button", "guardar");
            } else if(btnVal === "REALOCAR"  || btnVal.includes("ENVIAR PARA")){
                window.sessionStorage.setItem("button", "null");
            } else {
                window.sessionStorage.setItem("button", "tabChange");
            }
        });
    $("button[name=cancel]").click(function() {
            window.sessionStorage.setItem("button", "null");
            window.sessionStorage.setItem("previousPage", "processo");
        });
        
        $("form").submit(function() {
            var btnVal = $(document.activeElement).val();
            
            if(btnVal === 'GUARDAR'){
                window.sessionStorage.setItem("button", "guardar");
            } else if(btnVal === "REALOCAR"  || btnVal.includes("ENVIAR PARA")){
                window.sessionStorage.setItem("button", "null");
            } else {
                window.sessionStorage.setItem("button", "tabChange");
            }
        });
});

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">


$(function(){

    var assignmentButton;
    
    nomeBotao();
    
    $("select[name=field2_2_detalheProcessoDistrates_estado_processo]").on('change', function() {
        nomeBotao();
    });
    
    $(window).on('load', function() {
        nomeBotao();
    });
    
    function nomeBotao(){
        var estadoProcesso = $("select[name=field2_2_detalheProcessoDistrates_estado_processo] :selected").val();
        var flagUltimaAtividade='#variable.flag_ultima_atividade#';
        
        if(estadoProcesso === undefined){
            estadoProcesso = "#form.detalhe_proce_dist.estado_processo[{form.processos_distrates.detalhe_processo}]#";
        }
        
        /*Botão Assignment Complete*/
        if(estadoProcesso == 'PND' || estadoProcesso =='PNDEQ'){
            //assignmentButton = "COLOCAR PENDENTE";
            $("#assignmentComplete").hide();
            //$("#enviar_processo_hidden").val("PND");
        }else{
            $("#assignmentComplete").show();
            if(flagUltimaAtividade == 1){
                assignmentButton = "FINALIZAR PROCESSO";
            }else{
                assignmentButton = "PROXIMA ATIVIDADE";
            }
            $("#assignmentComplete").val(assignmentButton);
        }
        
        /*Botão Guardar*/
        if(estadoProcesso == 'PND' || estadoProcesso == 'PNDEQ'){
            $("#saveAsDraft").val("COLOCAR PENDENTE");
        }else{
            $("#saveAsDraft").val("GUARDAR");
        }
    }
    
    $("#cancel").text("CANCELAR"); 
    
    /*Hide the Reassign button*/
    var listGroups = '#currentUser.groups.name#';
    if(listGroups.toLowerCase().includes("coordenadores")){

    }else{

        $('#process_reassign').parent().hide()
    }
 
});
</script>
